attributes.additional_details:
On the 23 June 2016, when the UK voted by 51.9% to 48.1% to leave the European Uniono to grant  a 2nd referendum simply because they didn't get their own way is undemocratic and downright wrong! It is also a waste of money.

Our democracy works on the 50+1 rule.

The people have spoken
attributes.background: We the people that put the government in power and to act and voice on the behalf of the people is not carrying out the wishes of the people to leave  the European Uniono.
